channel.description: Recent content in instagram on rubot

item.title: Things I Like About Instagram Hipstamatic
item.description: In the last couple of months I have been getting into iPhone photography or as it is more popularly known as iPhoneography. I started out by using Instagram and have now graduated to using both Instagram and Hipstamatic. At first glance I thought these apps were similar and favoured Instagram because of its ease of use.
